author: Alex Abad-Santos
title: Super Bowl 2017: watch all the movie trailers that aired during the game
text: Super Bowl 2017: watch all the movie trailers that aired during the game Mutants, superheroes, and transformers … Feb 5, 2017, 9:39pm EST Supported by Millions of people watch the Super Bowl every year, and movie studios know this better than anyone. That’s why they’re peppering the game’s commercial space with trailers previewing their upcoming blockbusters: Superheroes, transformers, mutants, Fox’s Logan , Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy V ol. II ,and Paramount’s Ghost in the Shell all showcased new trailers during the big game. We've collected them all below for your (pre)viewing pleasure:
